marklogic.body:
Â It think it's bullshit when non black people Act as if slavery ended 500 years ago. It's been less than 150 years and Jim Crow lasted another 100 years. What the hell do you not understand about policys 50 years ago having an influence on the lives of people today? It's not it's some black guy who robbed a bank and when asked why gives the excuse"because of slavery". A young black male was killed in Cold blood because of stereotypes. When does it end?
You have White people(not only) bitching about a quality of life because of a recession that happen 4 years ago, now try a decades after decade recession? Do only middle American whites get the right to complain?
